body:
Both `CreateNewFileWithUniqueName` and `LocalTempFilename` do not create new file, they just create new file name, check if it exists in file system. If does not exist, return `true`, otherwise clear string and return `false`.

`CreateNewFileWithUniqueName` -> `CreateUniqueFileName`?
body_html:
